meta.content: Avalon Simi Valley - Apartments in Simi Valley, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.a: Now leasing newly renovated apartment homes!

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about unifying it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great distances designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Situated at a prestigious location, Avalon Simi Valley offers exquisite one-, two- and three-bedroom Simi Valley apartments to cater to all your needs. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, and smart technology and services including, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Discover a wealth of luxurious apartment amenities and a wide variety of facilities within the Avalon community that cater to all your needs. The ideal blend of amazing services and a professional on-site staff will make these homes at Avalon Simi Valley the right place for you! SIMI VALLEY APARTMENTS BY AVALON Ventura County is full of exciting things to do in your free time. You can check out various attractions such as the Simi Valley Cultural Arts Center, the Simi Valley Dance Center or Will Geer's Theatricum Botanicum. If you're looking for a dash of excitement, you can visit the MB2 Raceway or spend a day with your family at the Wildlife Learning Center. There is also a vast array of dining and shopping venues for you to sample and explore. You will never experience a dull moment when you make Avalon Simi Valley your new home. SIMI VALLEY APARTMENT COMMUNITY When you discover a new home in our Simi Valley apartments, you will also come across the Avalon Advantage. This special program offers a set of exclusive benefits to residents. All routine maintenance is addressed within one business day of a resident's request to the management. Avalon also works individually with you to customize leasing terms that meet your needs. If you're relocating or shifting cities, Avalon will also be happy to help you to find a new home in one of its many amazing communities. You will find it easy to meet all your demands with Avalon. Don't wait any longer. Contact us immediately and discover the best Simi Valley apartments in Ventura County today!

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

We go to great distances designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. Situated at a prestigious location, Avalon Simi Valley offers exquisite one-, two- and three-bedroom Simi Valley apartments to cater to all your needs. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers pre-installed high-speed and community-wide WiFi, and smart technology and services including, the ability to submit maintenance requests and pay your rent online, Amazon Hub package lockers, and more. Discover a wealth of luxurious apartment amenities and a wide variety of facilities within the Avalon community that cater to all your needs. The ideal blend of amazing services and a professional on-site staff will make these homes at Avalon Simi Valley the right place for you! SIMI VALLEY APARTMENTS BY AVALON Ventura County is full of exciting things to do in your free time. You can check out various attractions such as the Simi Valley Cultural Arts Center, the Simi Valley Dance Center or Will Geer's Theatricum Botanicum. If you're looking for a dash of excitement, you can visit the MB2 Raceway or spend a day with your family at the Wildlife Learning Center. There is also a vast array of dining and shopping venues for you to sample and explore. You will never experience a dull moment when you make Avalon Simi Valley your new home. SIMI VALLEY APARTMENT COMMUNITY When you discover a new home in our Simi Valley apartments, you will also come across the Avalon Advantage. This special program offers a set of exclusive benefits to residents. All routine maintenance is addressed within one business day of a resident's request to the management. Avalon also works individually with you to customize leasing terms that meet your needs. If you're relocating or shifting cities, Avalon will also be happy to help you to find a new home in one of its many amazing communities. You will find it easy to meet all your demands with Avalon. Don't wait any longer. Contact us immediately and discover the best Simi Valley apartments in Ventura County today!","previewWordCount":50},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","id":"f0fPkFZUpf9H7VF","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"imgSrc":"https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/avalonbay/GXSAHEHZHFHK7KWYDH6Y5QPGIM.jpg","furnishedDescription":"Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV.","imgAlt":null},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","props":{"collection":"chains","type":"CORE_CommunityBrandCards","id":"c0fkEIs6qf9H7uf","customFields":{"title":"The service.\nThe standards.\nThe life."},"displayProperties":{}},"children":[{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/CommunityBrandCard","id":"f0fVjggYpf9H7Xp","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"title":"The Service","link":"/","description":"Great service is one of the things we think about most.
